mapper.select: select * from project_board where pboard_state = '모집중' order by pboard_date DESC limit 0,7
SELECT s.skill_id, s.skill_name FROM project_skill p JOIN skills s ON p.skill_id = s.skill_id WHERE p.pboard_id = #{pboard_id};

select f.*, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(ui.user_name) = 2 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(ui.user_name, 1, 1), '*') WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(ui.user_name) = 3 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(ui.user_name, 1, 1), '*', SUBSTRING(ui.user_name, 3, 1)) WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(ui.user_name) > 3 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(ui.user_name, 1, 1), REPEAT('*', CHAR_LENGTH(ui.user_name) - 2), SUBSTRING(ui.user_name, CHAR_LENGTH(ui.user_name), 1)) ELSE ui.user_name END AS user_name from freelancer f LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON f.user_no = ui.user_no where freelancer_state = '구직중' order by freelancer_date DESC limit 0,7;
SELECT s.skill_id, s.skill_name FROM freelancer_skill f JOIN skills s ON f.skill_id = s.skill_id WHERE f.freelancer_id = #{freelancer_id};
